properties.displayName: File Encoded To Base64 Via Certutil.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-encode" or ProcessCommandLine contains "/encode") and (FolderPath endswith "\\certutil.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "CertUtil.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of certutil with the "encode" flag to encode a file to base64. This can be abused by threat actors and attackers for data exfiltration
